mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BF_PROD_PROCESS proc, BF_PROD_INST_DETAIL detail, BF_CMN_FINISH_PRODUCT_CODE prodcode WHERE proc.inst_prod_no = detail.inst_prod_no AND detail.fin_prd_cd_code = prodcode.fin_prd_cd_code AND process_order = 5 AND NOT completion_status = 'y' AND NOT in_dtl_vol = 0

SELECT mchn.mchn_name, mchn.mchn_stts, mchn.mchn_code FROM BF_EQP_MCHN mchn, BF_CMN_LINE_CODE linecode, BF_CMN_LINE_CODE_HD linehd, BF_CMN_BOM_CODE bomcode WHERE mchn.mchn_code = linecode.mchn_code AND linecode.line_cd_hd_code = linehd.line_cd_hd_code AND linehd.line_cd_hd_code = bomcode.line_cd_hd_code AND fin_prd_cd_code = #{finPrdCdCode} AND linecode.line_cd_ord = 5 order by linecode.line_cd_ord
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BF_SALES_IN_DTL ( sls_in_dtl_no, process_perfom_no, sls_in_dtl_date, fin_prd_cd_code, sls_in_dtl_vol ) VALUES ( 'SLS_IN'||LPAD(BF_SALES_IN_DTL_SEQ.nextval,3,0), (SELECT process_perfom_no FROM BF_PROD_PROCESS_PERFORMANCE WHERE process_no = #{processNo}), #{slsInDtlDate}, #{finPrdCdCode}, #{slsInDtlVol} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM bf_prod_process WHERE inst_prod_no = #{instProdNo} AND process_order=5 order by 2,3
